translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人類が魔人と本格的に戦った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The first war in which humanity fought seriously against the demonic beings...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初の戦争……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The initial war...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある意味、私達の先輩ですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a way, they are our predecessors."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、黒部はどうした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, what happened to Kurobe?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔人ザビエルとの戦いで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "In the battle against the demon Xavier,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺され、完全に破壊された筈だった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was killed and was supposed to have been completely destroyed..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、当の魔人ザビエルが死んだからか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, perhaps because the demon Xavier himself died,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: または魔軍と人類の戦いの影響か、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or due to the effects of the war between the demon army and humanity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はたまた単純に年月故にか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: or simply because of the passage of time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「理由こそ分からんが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The reason is unknown,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 2300年の時を経て黒部殿が復活された」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but after 2300 years, Lord Kurobe has been resurrected."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな昔の化石、ほっとけばいいだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That old fossil from so long ago, we should just leave it alone."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうもいかぬ理由がある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There's a reason why we can't do that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……忌々しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...How detestable."
"Huh?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町は端正な顔を怒りに歪めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: O-machi’s composed face twisted with anger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一部の妖怪が我が軍を離反し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Some of the yokai have betrayed our army,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 黒部殿の元についたのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and joined Lord Kurobe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「結果、妖怪軍は約半数にまで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As a result, the yokai army has been reduced to about half its size.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数を減らしてしまった」
「どいつもこいつも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Every single one of them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そう言うな、お町」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't say that, O-machi."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺は人間との共存を決め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I decided to coexist with humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 半ば強行する形で妖怪を奥州に閉じ込めた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and forcibly confined the yokai to Oshu."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「情けない話だが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a pathetic story, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのことで以前より
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because of that, many yokai have held

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺に反感を持つ妖怪は少なくないのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a grudge against me for a long time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、裏切られるとは間抜けめー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahaha, how foolish to be betrayed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「返す言葉もない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have no words to reply."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、お町さんが睨んでますよ、ランス様……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eek, O-machi-san is glaring at you, Lord Rance..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむむ、相変わらず怒らせると怖い」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Umm, as always, she's scary when angered."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、妖怪なんて元々
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, yokai were born to live as they please.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 好き勝手に生きてる奴らだしねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're all selfish by nature.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今みたいにまとめられてる方が異質なんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being united like now is actually the unusual circumstance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに事態を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, it seems there are some who want to worsen the situation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪化させたがってる奴もいるみたいで……」
「誰だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめーん、よく分かんない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, I don't really know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謎の女がその辺ちょろちょろして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A mysterious woman has been lurking around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色んな妖怪に黒部につくのを勧めてんだって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: encouraging various yokai to join Kurobe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黒部の部下かなんかか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is she one of Kurobe’s subordinates or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うんにゃ、どっかの陣営に属すでもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, she belongs to no faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ皆が困っているのを楽しんでるみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she just seems to enjoy watching everyone in trouble."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「名前は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her name is... something like Keiko, or something similar."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傾向だか、なんかそんな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or Kiko, or some such."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、混乱してる方が面白いって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there are always some twisted people who think things are more fun when they're chaotic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひねくれ者はどこにでもいるからねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such sourpusses exist everywhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話を本題に戻そう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's get back to the main topic."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今みたいにまとめられてる方が異質なんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being united like now is actually the unusual circumstance."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに事態を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Also, it seems there are some who want to worsen the situation...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 悪化させたがってる奴もいるみたいで……」
「誰だ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Who is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ごめーん、よく分かんない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Sorry, I don't really know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「謎の女がその辺ちょろちょろして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A mysterious woman has been lurking around,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色んな妖怪に黒部につくのを勧めてんだって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: encouraging various yokai to join Kurobe."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黒部の部下かなんかか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is she one of Kurobe’s subordinates or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うんにゃ、どっかの陣営に属すでもなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, she belongs to no faction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ皆が困っているのを楽しんでるみたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she just seems to enjoy watching everyone in trouble."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「名前は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Her name is... something like Keiko, or something similar."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 傾向だか、なんかそんな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Or Kiko, or some such."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、混乱してる方が面白いって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, there are always some twisted people who think things are more fun when they're chaotic."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひねくれ者はどこにでもいるからねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such sourpusses exist everywhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーん？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話を本題に戻そう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's get back to the main topic."
